content.text: I'm afraid of not being able to accomplish my dreams.
To be a professional athlete. I love baseball and I would love to play in the MLB.
That's a great dream! I love baseball too. My favorite player is Mike Trout.
He's an amazing player! I'm a huge fan of his.
Yes, I do! I play for my high school team.
That's awesome! I bet you're really good.
I'm okay. I'm not the best player, but I'm trying to get better.
Well, I'm sure you'll accomplish your dream of playing in the MLB. You just have to keep working hard and never give up.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll keep working hard and hopefully I can make it to the big leagues.
